document_data.name: Cedar River
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cedar River''' was a waterway that passed through the [[Gulthmere Forest]] on the [[Dragon Coast]], in the [[Eastern Heartlands]] of [[Faer√ªn]].
document_data.Trade: The river was used by some merchants and traders to move their product to the city of [[Cedarspoke]].
document_data.Geography: The Cedar River originated at two adjacent mountain ranges: first as the '''North Cedar River''' flowing northeast from the [[Orbrekh]], and second as the '''South Cedar River''' flowing north from the [[Orsraun Mountains]] Each of these waterways came together at a point in the forest, before continuing north and emptying out into [[Starmantle Bay]].
document_data.Notable Locations: * [[Cedarspoke]], the Cedar River passed directly through the capital of [[Gulthandor]], dividing it in half.
